bike.description: Monocoque High Modulus C-7 carbon with custom weave carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: High Modulus C-7 carbon stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger and CNC Disc mount only option

components.description: NEW Shimano XTR w/ Integrated BB Spindle, 22/32/44T
NEW Mavic Crossmax SLR Disc Tubeless
NEW Shimano XTR Hydraulic Disc w/160 F & 140 R
NEW Shimano XTR Exterior Bearing System
Ritchey Logic Zero Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Rock Shox Reba World Cup Carbon, 85mm travel w/Motion Control and PopLoc remote
NEW Shimano XTR Dual Control Shifter/Hydraulic Brake Lever, 27-speed
WTB Devo Team Ti w/DNA padding and Ti rails
